MY HISTORY APP

IMAD 5112 ASSIGNMENT REPORT 1

Mikateko kearabetsoe Motau

\[Year\]

1. Purpose

The purpose of this application is to demonstrate the ages of historical figures who are famous for many reasons against the user’s age. This helps the user to have a more knowledgeable approach into history’s finest figures or more so its finest humanitarians. The app will be used by a younger generation, mainly school pupils and adults who are wondering and feel a need to compare their ages against these historical figures. The solo purpose for this is so the user familiarizes themselves with historians and what they are famously known for.

The globe image is used as a background image for the second image. The globe image represents the level of diversity within the app. The second image serves as a identifier for the context within the application.

Solomon Tsekisho Plaatje was a politician, journalist, human rights campaigner, novelist and translator at the turn of the 19th century - one of the most gifted and versatile black South Africans of his generation.
